title: Austinpussy
description: The grooviest filmmaker in the history of cinema takes on Austin Powers, international man of mystery. This shagadelic biopic features run-ins with Dixie Normous, Dr. Evil and Mini Me, and the infamous Goldmember.
quote: Shall we shag now or shag later?
altHero: Tom Cruise dressed as Austin Powers in thick glasses and ruffly shirt
alt1: Austin’s British flag car with “Shaguar” license plate
alt3: Danny DeVito flips the bird dressed as Mini Me
alt4: John Travolta dressed as Goldmember picks at his chin skin
